website_summaries.verdict: Western Digital's Passport Portable External Hard Drive lets you take a lot of data on the road for a low price.
pros: comes with a zippered, hard carrying case
cons: Sync software works with only Windows XP and 2000
phone support may eventually become expensive

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, fast and beautifull...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome hard drive. The finishing reminds the samsumg lcd televisions. Beautifull brilliant black with rounded corners. Very quiet. You can't hear any noise even when accessing large amount of data from or to it. Data is written and read very fast... faster then my buit-in 40GB laptop hd. I just had a problem with my laptop, which does not give enough power from one USB port. So I had to buy another USB cable with two inputs, since the hard drive comes with a single input cable. But this is my laptop problem, with my desktop I didn't have any power issue, using the cable originally sold with the HD.
customer_reviews.author: L. Moreno

customer_reviews.title: As good as they get
customer_reviews.text: LOVE it! With 9-10 machines that I need to synchronize data between, some laptops some desktops, this is the right external HD and the price is certainly right, having broken below the $1/gig point that external drives seem to have been stuck at. It's not blazingly fast, but fast enough to work from. It's quite quiet and the design is exceptionally slick with the rubber cover over the usb port. My only complaint (and it's a pithy one) is that the usb cable shipped with the drive is no bigger than about 4 inches.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Powerbook users beware!!
customer_reviews.text: Though WD makes no mention of the fact, 17 and 15 inch powerbook G4's do not have powerful enough USB ports to support this drive. This is a known issue, and yet WD has not decided to include a Y-adapter (included with many other brands of portable drives) so that you can use two usb ports to get enough power and bandwidth for correct operation. Plugged in my brand new drive this morning, and all it did was "click..click..click.."; no spinning, no nothing. Worthless. If you are a Powerbook owner, get a portable drive with FIREWIRE.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Skorik

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and small
customer_reviews.text: Performs as advertised and very reliable. Nice size and works well with my MacBook Pro. I use mine to store my I-tunes library, as I wanted to free up space on my notebook. Simply plug into the USB port, click I-tunes and there's the whole deal! Couldn't ask for more from this product. Was hesitant to purchase in the beginning, due to other reviews, but I had no problem with any of the 120 gb WD externals, so I went ahead and purchased this 160 gb. No problems whatsoever and I use the longer cord from my older WD 120 gb externals.
customer_reviews.author: T Harris

customer_reviews.title: Really nice and efficient product.
customer_reviews.text: This is great for expert users and for people who don't know anything about computers. Easy plug and play usage makes it perfect for anyone who needs to back up data or easily and quickly transfer data from work to home or any other place they use a computer. I use mine mainly for music, pictures and movies that I put on my IPOD but obviously it can be used for anything. From another review I read, I went at formatted the drive for NTFS for my convenience, but that is not necessary. And as always, western digital provides a quality hard drive that is affordable, portable and overall a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Francis J. Saccone III

customer_reviews.title: GREAT drive
customer_reviews.text: The finish on this drive is really an art form..and it works great. The one caution is that the USB cable is REALLY short a requirement so that the drive can be powered from the USB bus - so don't expect to be able to replace the cable with a longer one. Should NOT be a problem with most notebook applications - using mine with a std PC though and the USB ports are not accessable with out putting the drive on some kind of riser in order for the cable to reach.
customer_reviews.author: Old Kraut

customer_reviews.title: This item could be better
customer_reviews.text: We are disappointed with the external drive. The package did not have directions and our son deleted all of his photos before he realized that he was using the drive incorrectly. I used it to back up my laptop with little success. The laptop kept freezing and turning itself off. The external drive seems to overheat the computer. I will buy another external drive; however, it will be a different brand as this one did not do the job for us.
customer_reviews.author: RWK

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Just as expected from its agent. As a customer of Amazon since 2001 came in 2006 to ‎steal the PIN Visa card Net by a thief the full amount of ‎the card 2000 SR Saudi or approximately $ 533 ...and ‎The procurement for this year 2013 is the worst years ‎for many reasons, including the low level of quality ‎electrical and electronic equipment, lack of sufficiently ‎detailed explanation of the device and this is ‎considered cheating and fraud of the Amazon to its ‎customers and will find the explanation and pictures ‎of it.‎
customer_reviews.author: A. Edrees

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: My objective was to buy the largest 2.5 portable harddrive available. I found it in the Western Digital. Elegant shiney black case, a blue LED circle light, with only 1 cable, I have no complaints towards performance or looks. I own a larger 320gb but i needed something with no power cable, this is the LEXUS of 2.5 portable harddrives. It even has backup software on it, but I'm not sure I will use it or not.
customer_reviews.author: D-DUB

customer_reviews.title: Just the perfect hard drive for you
customer_reviews.text: This item is just perfect for my Toshiba A135, it stylish perfecly combine with my Dark Blue Laptop. The 160gb 5400rpm hard drive is above the average right now. You can fill it with all your documents, music and movies at the same time. Fit's perfectly in your pocket. The USB cable is just fine if you are using it with a laptop. Works full in Vista.
customer_reviews.author: R. Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Good to go external DVD
customer_reviews.text: Western Digital has always made excellent hard drives. This external is sleek and sexy in appearance and performs well. I have an 80, 120, and now the 160 GB. It conducts adequate speed when transferring files. It's not better than an internal, but it outshines other external. A plus it that you require no other power source.
customer_reviews.author: Kaine

customer_reviews.title: Great Drive!!!
customer_reviews.text: After reading some of the below average reviews on stand alone wd hard drives I was a little hesitant to purchase one. But I went ahead and ordered the 160 gig passport drive anyway. This drive has worked flawlessly. It was easy to set up the way I wanted it, and I can read or write to it quickly. All in all I would purchase another one in the future, and I recommend this drive to any one who needs portable external storage!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Never been a problem
customer_reviews.text: the hard drive is pretty awesome. i use it for storing some of my movies and other media, especially when i go on the road. i just plug it in to my laptop and have a plethora of movies to watch. one thing i want to note is the the usb must be plugged into a usb 2.0 or it requires additional power. also, the usb cord that comes with this is very short, so its good to have it sit right next to your computer. just for those with an xbox 360, the ports in the front of that are NOT usb 2.0 and therefore will not power the hard drive.
customer_reviews.author: Koz

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: This is a great backup system. Take it out of the package and connect to the computer. Works on my Mac and my PC. Both computers recognized the drive immediately. It does not get any better than this. So now I have peace of mind that I can back up my work and take it with me in a small format that fits in my jacket pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great but with a little case would be perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is my first external hard disk (i have a DIY external disk from a notebook hard drive). Is very useful for my needs. The sync software is not as good as i want.. so i dont use it :) The lack of a case,- leather case will be great - make my hard disk become scratchy with the time.. i can live with that :)
customer_reviews.author: Cesar Fong

customer_reviews.title: Good size for portable storage
customer_reviews.text: You won't even know your carrying it in your bag until you need it. It weighs almost nothing and has 160 Gig's of storage. Place it in a protective case and you can depend on it work when you need it. Comes with software to help you perform backups. If you need portable storage, look no further.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Kucher

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great product
customer_reviews.text: This was a very good deal. I spent a lot of time surfing and researching and this was a very good deal. It was easy to install and use. It holds 5 back ups on it for me. Very simple and no nonsense use. And extremely light weight!
customer_reviews.author: Heavyweight Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Fast and very portable
customer_reviews.text: Nice and small! Fast and doesn't need a separate plug and connection for power. Does both connection and power from the USB port. This brand is one of the top ones for external hard drives also from what I've read and hear from my techno geek friend. I only wish I had shopped around on price a bit more or waited a little longer, but such is technology. These are so hot these days it seems the price drops more every week.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Excelent but...
customer_reviews.text: There are basically 2 reasons why I didn't give this product 5-Stars: 1. The surface is very easily scratched; even as new, the product was already scratched. 2. The product came with a 10cm (4 inches or so) USB cable which is pretty much pathetic. I had to purchase a decent cable afterwards. (Which is like $2 at the most). Otherwise, this is an excellent HDD for this price and if you don't care about those two points, I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: D@N

customer_reviews.title: good ext. hard for the money
customer_reviews.text: a hard drive that looks slick and is very thin compare to other drives. works great right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: DKwarrior

customer_reviews.title: Works Like New
customer_reviews.text: Well what can I say. I have had this HD for a very long time and it is still working as good as new. If you need a HD of this size then there is nothing wrong with buying this one.
customer_reviews.author: Kieran

customer_reviews.title: Small & Useful
customer_reviews.text: This item is a nice small size so it works well for my wife totting data back and forth from work and home. It's not a fast drive but it's nice and small so it fits in her purse or with her netbook in its small bag.
customer_reviews.author: Leith Tussing

customer_reviews.title: Great quiet drive... no external power brick!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this drive. I now have two of them. They work right out of the box, no setup or configuration necessary. No external power supply, it runs right off the USB power. Perfectly quiet and very small.... what's not to like?
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Western Digital 160GB 2.5-inch Passport USB Portable Hard Drive.
customer_reviews.text: Must say the price is right for the product, best in the market offered by Amazon.com. Although shipping took some time to get the product to me. Passport USB portable HD is well made sleek external HD with no need of external power source. The USB connection to my MAC is good enough for its functioning. the drive is a very light weight and easy to use. A must have and I must recommend it to all.
customer_reviews.author: Chanman

customer_reviews.title: a good idea
customer_reviews.text: This is a great idea. I considered it to be a great way to back up my system and files while shifting computers. It was only partially successful because it is not compatible with Mac 9 and only sporadically compatible with Mac OS X.
customer_reviews.author: Charles B. Warren

customer_reviews.title: Portable, fast, convenient
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought this portable hard drive to free up some space on my laptop. I transferred about 100 GB onto the drive in a relatively short amount of time, I think around 25-30 minutes. Although it may be slightly more expensive than some other external hard drives, it makes up for it in its smal, compact, portable size. It makes it incredibly convenient to take to other places. Another amazing thing about it is that it does not need to be plugged into the wall, it simply uses the USB for power! Overall, I would highly recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: Funky

customer_reviews.title: Be careful when u buying passport drives do not move ...
customer_reviews.text: Be careful when u buying passport drives do not move around to much. My drive stop working after a year owning this one.
customer_reviews.author: karim muhammad

customer_reviews.title: These things are great!
customer_reviews.text: I have the 160 GB version of this product. It works great, is easy to use, and it even survived a trip through the washing machine, no problems. Buy the big one though it is a better deal.
customer_reviews.author: Otzen42

customer_reviews.title: Great little drive
customer_reviews.text: Fast file transfers via USB 2.0. Very, very quiet drive. Small enough to fit well in my notebook bag and neatly beneath my notebook stand. Works very well with PC and Mac notebooks.
customer_reviews.author: Reno

customer_reviews.title: Stay Clear
customer_reviews.text: This drive crashed and my wife lost all of her photos from years back. All the techs we took it to said that you would have to pay a ridiculous amount of money to even try to get the memory back.
customer_reviews.author: wesmusic

customer_reviews.title: Very Dependable
customer_reviews.text: I have had this model for around 5 years. I have never lost any data and it still works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Porter Demshar

customer_reviews.title: so far so good.
customer_reviews.text: this hard drive is great not only because of it dimensions and capacity (which are really awesome) but the speed of storage, is pretty quick. I use it with a laptop and is comfortable because you just need to plug it to a usb port. The deliver was perfect and the package small and in my opinion this product worhts every single cent it costs.
customer_reviews.author: P. Ch

customer_reviews.title: Portable Hard Drive
customer_reviews.text: It was promptly recieved in perfect condition and it has worked perfectly for several months. I would use them again.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: one of the creation more helpfully for me and my computer stuff. have been an excellent portable hard drive without any inconvenient until now.so I recomended 100%
customer_reviews.author: Judimar D. Sosa Torres

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I like it because of its size; you can carry it on your shirt pocket. It's elegant, and you can easily learn on the manufacturer page, if you get any problem.
customer_reviews.author: Gustavo Rojas

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to buy this product because I needed to back up large files. This items still serves after over four years or so.
customer_reviews.author: Obioma

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Started using it on a friend's new Imac but bought for my 17" powerbook and once I tried to use it, it wouldn't mount on the desktop unless my powerbook was plugged to an external monitor and using the monitor's back usb, so there's some power issue related or to my usb or the drive. The product is stylish and the transaction was not a problem at all but for my main use it lacks some performance.
customer_reviews.author: Michelangelo Bernar

customer_reviews.title: Sleek, light weight, hassel free hard drive
customer_reviews.text: I got this product a month back and its very easy to use and without any hassels. No separate power cord required as it is powered by the USB connector and really sleek, light weight and hassel free drive.
customer_reviews.author: K. Kaul

customer_reviews.title: Died on 3rd day of use
customer_reviews.text: Drive worked fine at first and then died making strange whirring sounds even when computer not trying to access the drive. Strange, but when connected to any computer it has decided to call itself a 2 TB drive. I use an Apple MacBookPro (which has worked fine with other WD USB hard drives. I've requested a replacement drive. My recommendation: AVOID THIS DRIVE
customer_reviews.author: Humperdinck Jackman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use even for the non computer savy. Very small and portable. Exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: D. Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: I really didn't expect much from this item, but it blow me away. So quiet, smooth, fast, and small. I really recommend it for those who like to take there personal stuff away from PC
customer_reviews.author: Nawaf Alsuwaiyed

customer_reviews.title: Great backup!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great price for an external hard drive. Works great, easy to use, holds a lot of memory.
customer_reviews.author: K. Fleming

customer_reviews.title: Nuttin' but errors
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for two weeks. First it came formatted as FAT32, but a 160GB drive that's kinda silly. Reformatted to NTFS. Copied about 100GB of files to it, was unable to read all of them off. Reformatted low level, ran check disk to fix errors. Tried the same 100GB again, same result, IO errors on the read. Not impressed so far. Returning it and will try again.
customer_reviews.author: L. Whitmire

customer_reviews.title: Good Drive
customer_reviews.text: I have an Inspiron 8600 that I bought back in '04. Rarely do I have the small problem of the Power Surge, which only happens when I do not plug it in smoothly into the USB port. To fix it I just plug it in again. Small inconvenience with the drive, but other than that it serves its purpose well.
customer_reviews.author: C16

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Very fast, very portable, very light. Performs as indicated. Straightforward 2.0 USB connection, no messy power cords. Love the sleek look. I use it as my primary iTunes library folder; I've had no problems with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: carlosi79

customer_reviews.title: Good backup
customer_reviews.text: What can i say?? it works very good, looks very good also (will get scratches easily), and it has a back-up software that rocks.
customer_reviews.author: Gerardo C. Guzman Lozano

customer_reviews.title: Awesome device
customer_reviews.text: This little gadget is amazing. The thing that i like the most about it is its size. Very practical and whole lot of memory....
customer_reviews.author: Ricky R.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I use this portable hard drive almost everyday between work and home. I love it's ease of use and in the years I've had it...I've never run into a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: WD 160 Nice
customer_reviews.text: It's smaller than the silver older version , But the down part about it is that the body can get scratched easily. But again very nice product
customer_reviews.author: Abdullah S. AL-Zaidan

customer_reviews.title: WD 160GB portable hard drive
customer_reviews.text: Product was great slim size, portable and works well. It was delivered in a timely manner.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Sharon S. Hammel

customer_reviews.title: Good Product at great price!
customer_reviews.text: After checking around, I found this to be a good product at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Stud Muffin

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: received in time in good shape, and works just as i needed it. the plastic packaging looks like it had been opened, but all the components were there.
customer_reviews.author: Felix Izquierdo

customer_reviews.title: Good One
customer_reviews.text: This works out well for data storage. Till now i have not faced any problems with it. WD also replaces the piece if there are any problems with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashok Cheenepalli

customer_reviews.title: External Hard Drive
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product & price! Only problem is that with Windows XP you have to reformat the WD Drive to make it compatible. Bit of drag.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta M. Shinn

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product, easy to set up, very small and sleek looking, I've never had a problem with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Augenstein

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: I am no computer geek but this was so easy to use! It is small and looks good!!!!
customer_reviews.author: L. Bramley

customer_reviews.title: Drive Failed.  Unasable.  All data lost.  Stay away from this product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using external USB drives for the last few years. I've tried several different manufacturers including Western Digital and I've never had any problems-- not lost even a single filre or received any errror messages. This drive failed after 2 days and I lost all my data. Now I can't even get it to format. Its essentially unusable. I would avoid this product.
customer_reviews.author: Chas Kaye

customer_reviews.title: I really like this drive
customer_reviews.text: I use this with a Macbook and it just works. I have not had any of the power problems that some reviews have mentioned and I am only plugging it into one USB port. I have two of these and I use them to clone my internal hard drives on my Macbook and my wife's Macbook Pro. Both have performed very well. You do give up a little speed on backups but for its purpose it works very well.
customer_reviews.author: DigitalMan

product_meta.title: Western Digital 160GB 2.5-inch Passport USB Portable Hard Drive
product_meta.description:
High-performance portable storage for your Mac and PC. Light and rugged, it is easy to carry and no external power adapter is needed. Comes with sync encryption and Google software.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Pack up your office files and take them home. Carry thousands of songs or pictures. These drives are simple to use, light and easy to carry, and require no power adapter--they are powered directly through the USB cable. 

 Key Features 

 Easy: Installation is a snap because you don't really "install" this drive; you just plug it in and it's ready to use. There is no CD to install; the included software loads from the drive the first time you plug it in. 

 Smart: Powered by the USB bus, so no separate power supply needed.* 

 Ultra-portable: This ultra-portable drive fits easily in your pocket or purse, weighs only a few ounces and holds tons of valuable data. 

 Synchronized and Secure: WD Sync synchronization and encryption software lets you save your critical data, and take it with you. Plug your drive into any PC, edit files, read e-mail, and view photos. Then sync all of your changes back to your home or office computer. (Windows only) 

 Google software: Search your drive, manage your photos, and simplify Web searches with included Google software. (Windows only). 

 Fast: 5400 RPM hard drive – almost 24% faster than 4200 RPM drives. 

 Compatible - Use with Windows and Macintosh computers 

 Ideal For: 

 

 * Carrying important files and e-mail between work and home or on the road 
 * Sharing large files between office and home, between Mac and PC 
 * Backing up your existing notebook hard drive for extra data safety

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars242 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
